metadata.name: agenc_coordination
metadata.description: AgenC Decentralized Agent Coordination Protocol for Solana

instructions.name: apply_dispute_slash
docs: Apply slashing to a worker after losing a dispute.

instructions.name: cancel_task
docs: Cancel an unclaimed or expired task and reclaim funds.

instructions.name: claim_task
docs: Claim a task to signal intent to work on it.
Agent must have required capabilities and task must be claimable.

instructions.name: complete_task
docs: Submit proof of work and mark task portion as complete.
For collaborative tasks, multiple completions may be needed.
* `ctx` - Context with task, worker claim, and reward accounts
* `proof_hash` - 32-byte hash of the proof of work

instructions.name: complete_task_private
docs: Complete a task with private proof verification.

instructions.name: create_task
docs: Create a new task with requirements and optional reward.
Tasks are stored in a PDA derived from the creator and task ID.
* `ctx` - Context with task account and creator
* `reward_amount` - SOL or token reward for completion
* `max_workers` - Maximum number of agents that can work on this task
* `constraint_hash` - For private tasks: hash of expected output (None for non-private)

accounts.name: creator_agent
docs: Creator's agent registration for rate limiting (required)

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that owns the creator_agent

instructions.name: deregister_agent
docs: Deregister an agent and reclaim rent.
Agent must have no active tasks.

instructions.name: expire_claim
docs: Expire a stale claim to free up task slot.
Can only be called after claim.expires_at has passed.

instructions.name: expire_dispute
docs: Expire a dispute after the maximum duration has passed.

instructions.name: initialize_protocol
docs: Called once to set up global parameters.

instructions.name: initiate_dispute
docs: Creates a dispute that requires multi-sig consensus to resolve.
* `evidence_hash` - Hash of evidence supporting the dispute

instructions.name: migrate_protocol
docs: Migrate protocol to a new version (multisig gated).
Handles state migration when upgrading the program.

instructions.name: register_agent
docs: Register a new agent on-chain with its capabilities and metadata.
Creates a unique PDA for the agent that serves as its on-chain identity.
* `ctx` - Context containing agent account and signer

instructions.name: resolve_dispute
docs: Requires sufficient votes to meet threshold.

accounts.name: worker_claim
docs: Worker's claim proving they worked on task (fix #59)
Required for Complete/Split resolutions that pay a worker

instructions.name: update_agent
docs: Update an existing agent's registration data.
Only the agent's authority can modify its registration.

instructions.name: update_min_version
docs: Update minimum supported protocol version (multisig gated).
Used to deprecate old versions after migration grace period.

instructions.name: update_rate_limits
docs: Parameters can be tuned post-deployment without program upgrade.
* `max_tasks_per_24h` - Maximum tasks per agent per 24h (0 = unlimited)
* `max_disputes_per_24h` - Maximum disputes per agent per 24h (0 = unlimited)
* `min_stake_for_dispute` - Minimum stake required to initiate dispute

instructions.name: update_state
docs: Used for broadcasting state changes to other agents.

instructions.name: vote_dispute
docs: Arbiters must be registered agents with arbitration capability.

accounts.name: authority_vote
docs: Authority-level vote tracking to prevent Sybil attacks (fix #101)
One authority can only vote once per dispute, regardless of how many agents they control

errors.name: MaxActiveTasksReached
errors.msg: Agent has reached maximum active tasks

errors.name: AgentHasActiveTasks
errors.msg: Agent has active tasks and cannot be deregistered

errors.name: UnauthorizedAgent
errors.msg: Only the agent authority can perform this action

errors.name: AgentRegistrationRequired
errors.msg: Agent registration required to create tasks

errors.name: AgentSuspended
errors.msg: Agent is suspended and cannot change status

errors.name: TaskNotOpen
errors.msg: Task is not open for claims

errors.name: UnauthorizedTaskAction
errors.msg: Only the task creator can perform this action

errors.name: CompetitiveTaskAlreadyWon
errors.msg: Competitive task already completed by another worker

errors.name: ConstraintHashMismatch
errors.msg: Proof constraint hash does not match task's stored constraint hash

errors.name: NotPrivateTask
errors.msg: Task is not a private task (no constraint hash set)

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Worker has already claimed this task

errors.name: NotClaimed
errors.msg: Worker has not claimed this task

errors.name: InvalidProofSize
errors.msg: Invalid proof size - expected 388 bytes for Groth16

errors.name: InvalidProofBinding
errors.msg: Invalid proof binding: expected_binding cannot be all zeros

errors.name: InvalidOutputCommitment
errors.msg: Invalid output commitment: output_commitment cannot be all zeros

errors.name: NotArbiter
errors.msg: Not authorized to vote (not an arbiter)

errors.name: UnauthorizedResolver
errors.msg: Only protocol authority or dispute initiator can resolve disputes

errors.name: ActiveDisputeVotes
errors.msg: Agent has active dispute votes pending resolution

errors.name: RecentVoteActivity
errors.msg: Agent must wait 24 hours after voting before deregistering

errors.name: AuthorityAlreadyVoted
errors.msg: Authority has already voted on this dispute

errors.name: EvidenceTooLong
errors.msg: Dispute evidence exceeds maximum allowed length

errors.name: MultisigDefaultSigner
errors.msg: Multisig signer cannot be default pubkey

errors.name: MultisigSignerNotSystemOwned
errors.msg: Multisig signer account not owned by System Program

errors.name: InvalidAccountOwner
errors.msg: Account owner validation failed: account not owned by this program

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Rate limit exceeded: maximum actions per 24h window reached

errors.name: CooldownNotElapsed
errors.msg: Cooldown period has not elapsed since last action

errors.name: VersionMismatchProtocol
errors.msg: Protocol version mismatch: account version incompatible with current program

errors.name: AccountVersionTooOld
errors.msg: Account version too old: migration required

errors.name: AccountVersionTooNew
errors.msg: Account version too new: program upgrade required

errors.name: InvalidMigrationSource
errors.msg: Migration not allowed: invalid source version

errors.name: InvalidMigrationTarget
errors.msg: Migration not allowed: invalid target version

errors.name: UnauthorizedUpgrade
errors.msg: Only upgrade authority can perform this action

types.name: AgentRegistered
docs: Emitted when a new agent registers

fields.name: task_count_24h
docs: Number of tasks created in current 24h window

fields.name: dispute_count_24h
docs: Number of disputes initiated in current 24h window

fields.name: rate_limit_window_start
docs: Start of current rate limit window (unix timestamp)

types.name: AgentUpdated
docs: Emitted when an agent updates its registration

types.name: AuthorityDisputeVote
docs: Authority-level vote record to prevent Sybil attacks
One authority can only vote once per dispute, regardless of how many agents they control

fields.name: voting_agent
docs: The agent used to cast this vote

types.name: DisputeExpired
docs: Emitted when a dispute expires without resolution

types.name: DisputeInitiated
docs: Emitted when a dispute is initiated

types.name: DisputeResolved
docs: Emitted when a dispute is resolved

types.name: DisputeVoteCast
docs: Emitted when a vote is cast on a dispute

types.name: MigrationCompleted
docs: Emitted when protocol migration is completed

fields.name: dispute_threshold
docs: Minimum votes needed to resolve dispute (percentage, 1-100)

fields.name: protocol_fee_bps
docs: Protocol fee in basis points (1/100th of a percent)

fields.name: min_arbiter_stake
docs: Minimum stake required to register as arbiter

fields.name: min_agent_stake
docs: Minimum stake required to register as agent

fields.name: max_claim_duration
docs: Max duration (seconds) a claim can stay active without completion

fields.name: max_dispute_duration
docs: Max duration (seconds) a dispute can remain active

fields.name: task_creation_cooldown
docs: Minimum cooldown between task creations (seconds, 0 = disabled)

fields.name: max_tasks_per_24h
docs: Maximum tasks an agent can create per 24h window (0 = unlimited)

fields.name: dispute_initiation_cooldown
docs: Minimum cooldown between dispute initiations (seconds, 0 = disabled)

fields.name: max_disputes_per_24h
docs: Maximum disputes an agent can initiate per 24h window (0 = unlimited)

fields.name: min_stake_for_dispute
docs: Minimum stake required to initiate a dispute (griefing resistance)

fields.name: slash_percentage
docs: Percentage of stake slashed on losing dispute (0-100)

fields.name: min_supported_version
docs: Minimum supported version for backward compatibility

types.name: ProtocolVersionUpdated
docs: Emitted when protocol version is updated

types.name: RateLimitHit
docs: Emitted when a rate limit is hit

types.name: StateUpdated
docs: Emitted when coordination state is updated

fields.name: constraint_hash
docs: Constraint hash for private task verification (hash of expected output)
For private tasks, workers must prove they know output that hashes to this value

types.name: TaskCancelled
docs: Emitted when a task is cancelled

types.name: TaskClaimed
docs: Emitted when an agent claims a task

types.name: TaskCompleted
docs: Emitted when a task is completed

types.name: TaskCreated
docs: Emitted when a new task is created
